channel.title: Typing of the Dead: Overkill
channel.description: So this was just released on Steam. It's a conversion of the game House of the Dead: Overkill that came out a few years ago and also includes the PS3 version (extended cut) of the standard House of the Dead: Overkill. There will be free DLC later for 2 player co-op too.

item.title: Typing of the Dead: Overkill
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
HELL YES. I loved the original Typing of the Dead on Dreamcast. Will buy when I have the dough.

Read full topic

item.title: Typing of the Dead: Overkill
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
Zombies are randomly assigned words/phrases and you have to type them out to kill them.

Read full topic

item.title: Typing of the Dead: Overkill

Interesting.
